com.beaglebuddy.ape

Class APEFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.ape.APEFlags

  • public class APEFlags
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides methods for reading the APE flags which are found in an APE header, APE footer, and in APE item. The APE flags, while present in APEv1, are all zero's and are not used. In APEv2, the flag bits were assigned meanings.

    See Also:
    APEv1 Specification, APEv2 Specification
